DOC.brief_title: Post Market Follow-Up Study EVOLUTION® Total Knee Arthroplasty System With Cruciate Sacrificing Inserts
DOC.detailed_description: MicroPort Orthopedics Inc. ( MPO ) currently market EVOLUTION® TKA System globally , include European Union ( EU ) . As part process gain approval market EU , MicroPort conduct post market clinical follow-up ( PMCF ) study evaluate safety efficacy system . These type study require regulatory authority TKA device medium long-term clinical evidence available time gain approval market EU . The objective study evaluate component survivorship , cumulative revision rate , functional outcome score , subject satisfaction early , midterm , long-term follow-up .
